participant_1.background:

My dog introduced me to my first and second wives.
I enjoy my steaks cooked medium rare.

participant_2.background:
My dad died when i was in high school.
I have a lot of allergies.
I like watching tv and movies.
My favorite type of music is metal.

content.text: Hey, what's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love watching TV and movies!
Me too! What kind of shows do you like to watch?
I like a lot of different types of shows, but I'm really into sci-fi and fantasy right now.
Oh, me too! I love Star Trek, Doctor Who, and Game of Thrones.
Those are all great shows! I'm also a big fan of The Walking Dead and Stranger Things.
I love Stranger Things! I haven't started watching The Walking Dead yet, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely check it out. It's a really good show.
I will! So, what's your favorite metal band?
My favorite metal band is Metallica. They're my all-time favorite band.
I love Metallica! I saw them in concert a few years ago and it was an amazing experience.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
You should definitely go if you ever have the chance. It's a once in a lifetime experience.
I definitely will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to go hiking and camping. I love being outdoors.
That's great! I love hiking too. I went on a hike in the Grand Canyon last year and it was amazing.
The Grand Canyon is on my bucket list! I would love to hike there one day.
You should definitely go. It's an incredible experience.
I will! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool! I've always been interested in computer science.
It's a great field! I really enjoy it.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a software engineer?
I love the challenge of solving complex problems. I also love the feeling of creating something new.
That sounds really rewarding.
It is! I'm very lucky to have a job that I love.
It sounds like you're really passionate about your work.
I am! I'm so grateful to have found a career that I'm passionate about.
That's great to hear! So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
That's okay. You have plenty of time to figure it out.
Thanks! I hope so.
I'm sure you will.
